_comment: Ship log entries. Each entry needs: id, timestamp, sender, subject, level, detail. Optional: mediaType ('text'|'image'|'video'), mediaUrl, classification. Level: '' | 'warning' | 'critical'. Classification: '' | 'PERSONAL' | 'SYSTEM' | 'MU/TH/UR' | 'MEDICAL' | 'CONFIDENTIAL' | 'SENSITIVE' | 'RESTRICTED' | 'CORPORATE'.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — EMERGENCY TRITIUM CONTRACT
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — CAPTAIN VANESSA MILLER
DATE: MARCH 10, 2183

MET WITH JOHN WILSON AND TWO WEYLAND-YUTANI REPRESENTATIVES AT ANCHORPOINT TODAY. THEY WANT AN EMERGENCY TRITIUM RUN TO SUTTERS WORLD. SOMETHING ABOUT A REFINERY SHORTAGE AND A PRODUCTION DEADLINE THEY CANNOT MISS.

THE PAY IS THREE TIMES NORMAL RATES. THREE TIMES. I MADE THEM REPEAT IT BECAUSE I THOUGHT I HEARD WRONG. I DID NOT.

WILSON IS COMING ALONG AS CORPORATE LIAISON. STANDARD PRACTICE FOR A HIGH VALUE HAUL APPARENTLY. HE SEEMS ALRIGHT. POLISHED. COMPANY MAN THROUGH AND THROUGH BUT NOT THE WORST I HAVE DEALT WITH.

I DO NOT LOVE HAVING A WY SUIT LOOKING OVER MY SHOULDER FOR 90 DAYS BUT AT TRIPLE RATE I WILL SMILE AND NOD THE WHOLE WAY THERE. THIS IS THE KIND OF MONEY THAT CHANGES THINGS. THE LEASE OPTION. THE ENGINE OVERHAUL. MAYBE BOTH.

TOLD THE CREW TONIGHT. DAVIS IS ALREADY PLOTTING THE ROUTE. CHAM JUST NODDED LIKE HE ALWAYS DOES. RYE ASKED HOW MUCH HER CUT WOULD BE BEFORE I EVEN FINISHED TALKING.

WE LOAD THE TRITIUM TANKS TOMORROW. 72 HIGH PRESSURE UNITS. FULL BAY. SUTTERS WORLD OR BUST.

TOO GOOD TO PASS UP.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — CARGO LOADING AND DEPARTURE PREP
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — LYRON CHAM
DATE: MARCH 13, 2183

SPENT THE LAST THREE DAYS LOADING TRITIUM INTO THE HOLD. 72 HIGH PRESSURE TANKS. EACH ONE HAS TO BE SECURED INDIVIDUALLY WITH MAGNETIC CLAMPS AND SHOCK DAMPENERS. ONE WRONG MOVE AND THE WHOLE BAY GOES UP.

CARGO MANIFEST IS COMPLETE. ALL TANKS LOGGED AND ACCOUNTED FOR. RESEALED THE AFT CARGO LOCKS TWICE BECAUSE THE FIRST SET OF BOLTS DID NOT MEET SPEC. RATHER DO IT TWICE THAN DO IT WRONG.

RAN A FULL INSPECTION ON THE CARGO LIFTER SLED. DAISY IS SHOWING HER AGE BUT SHE WILL HOLD. TOPPED OFF THE HYDRAULIC LINES AND REPLACED THE PORT SIDE COUPLING.

MILLER WANTS TO DEPART TOMORROW. SHIP IS READY. ENGINE PRE CHECKS ARE GREEN. LIFE SUPPORT TOPPED OFF. RYE HELPED WITH THE FINAL CARGO NETTING THIS MORNING. DAVIS IS ON THE BRIDGE RUNNING NAV PLOTS.

I DO NOT LIKE TRITIUM. FLAMMABLE GAS IN HIGH PRESSURE TANKS SITTING TEN METERS FROM WHERE I SLEEP. BUT THE PAY IS THE PAY AND MILLER SAYS THIS RUN CHANGES THINGS FOR ALL OF US.

EVERYTHING IS SECURED. WE ARE GOOD TO GO.

logs.subject: DEPARTURE — ANCHORPOINT STATION
logs.detail:
NAV SYSTEM — DEPARTURE LOG

USCSS MONTERO (REG. 180924609) DEPARTED ANCHORPOINT STATION AT 08:00 UST.

COURSE: ANCHORPOINT STATION TO SUTTER'S WORLD
DISTANCE: 12 PARSECS
ESTIMATED TRANSIT TIME: 96 DAYS
ETA: 2183-06-20

SUBLIGHT DEPARTURE BURN COMPLETE. CLEARING ANCHORPOINT TRAFFIC CORRIDOR.
FEL DRIVE PRE SPIN: NOMINAL. FTL JUMP WINDOW SCHEDULED DAY 19.

CARGO: 72 HIGH PRESSURE TRITIUM TANKS — SECURED AND STABLE.
CREW: 5 — ALL ABOARD AND FIT FOR DUTY.

FUEL STATUS: 100%
ENGINE STATUS: NOMINAL
LIFE SUPPORT: NOMINAL

ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. BEGINNING TRANSIT.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — FINANCIAL REVIEW
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — CAPTAIN VANESSA MILLER
DATE: MARCH 14, 2183

RAN THE NUMBERS AGAIN TONIGHT. EVEN WITH THE BONUS FROM THE TRITIUM HAUL, I AM STILL SHORT ON THE LEASE-TO-BUY OPTION THE COMPANY OFFERED ON THE MONTERO. AND THAT IS BEFORE THE ENGINE OVERHAUL SHE NEEDS TO TRACTOR BIGGER LOADS.

EVERY RUN WE LOSE THOUSANDS BECAUSE THIS OLD GIRL CANNOT KEEP UP WITH THE NEWER FREIGHTERS. I HAVE BEEN AT THIS FOR FIFTEEN YEARS AND I AM STILL JUST A COG IN THE WY MACHINE.

IF I COULD GO INDEPENDENT, GET A NEWER SHIP OR AT LEAST UPGRADE HER FEL DRIVE, EVERYTHING CHANGES. BUT THE FRONTIER DOES NOT HAND OUT BREAKS.

MAYBE THE NEXT RUN PAYS BETTER. THAT IS WHAT I ALWAYS SAY..

logs.subject: PERSONAL — CANNOT SLEEP
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — LEAH DAVIS
DATE: MARCH 20, 2183

CANNOT SLEEP. BEEN RUNNING CARGO LOADING SIMS JUST TO HAVE SOMETHING TO DO BUT EVEN THOSE ARE GETTING OLD. THIS ROUTE TO SUTTERS WORLD IS THE LONGEST MILK RUN WE HAVE HAD IN MONTHS AND WE ARE NOT EVEN AT THE FTL JUMP YET.

PILL BOTTLE IS LOOKING THIN. MAYBE SIX OR SEVEN LEFT. COMPANY PRESCRIPTION RENEWAL IS NOT UNTIL WE HIT PORT AND THAT IS WEEKS AWAY.

GOING TO HAVE TO RATION. OR FIND ANOTHER SOURCE. NEITHER OPTION IS GREAT.

PUSHED THE LOADING ARM PAST REDLINE AGAIN TODAY JUST FOR THE RUSH. CHAM GAVE ME A LOOK BUT DID NOT SAY ANYTHING. HE IS GOOD LIKE THAT..

logs.subject: PERSONAL — CREW EVALUATION NOTES
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — JOHN WILSON
DATE: MARCH 28, 2183

SIX MONTHS EMBEDDED WITH THIS CREW NOW. EVALUATION IS NEARLY COMPLETE. ON PAPER THEY ARE MARGINAL — THE MONTERO IS AGING, EFFICIENCY METRICS ARE BELOW TARGET, AND MORALE IS INCONSISTENT.

BUT THE TRUTH IS I HAVE COME TO LIKE THEM. MILLER IS STUBBORN BUT COMPETENT. CHAM IS RELIABLE. EVEN RYE HAS A WORK ETHIC UNDER ALL THAT BITTERNESS.

STILL. THERE IS NO ROOM FOR SENTIMENT IN THIS LINE OF WORK. THE COMPANY EXPECTS RESULTS AND I INTEND TO DELIVER. IF AN OPPORTUNITY PRESENTS ITSELF TO ADVANCE, I WILL TAKE IT. THAT IS SIMPLY GOOD BUSINESS.

ACCESS KEYCARD IS CURRENT. ALL SYSTEMS NOMINAL.

logs.subject: CORPORATE DIRECTIVE — CREW EVALUATION
logs.detail:
CONFIDENTIAL — WEYLAND-YUTANI CORPORATE DIRECTIVE
REF: WY-OPS/FRONTIER-7741

TO: WILSON, J. — COMPANY LIAISON (USCSS MONTERO)
FROM: FRONTIER OPERATIONS DIVISION

RE: CREW EVALUATION & ASSET ASSESSMENT

YOU ARE DIRECTED TO COMPLETE A FULL CREW PERFORMANCE AND
LOYALTY ASSESSMENT FOR THE MONTERO CREW WITHIN 6 MONTHS.

KEY METRICS:
  — CAPTAIN MILLER: LEASE-TO-BUY LEVERAGE. ASSESS COMPLIANCE.
  — PILOT DAVIS: PERFORMANCE RELIABILITY. FLAG ANY SUBSTANCE CONCERNS.
  — ENGINEER CHAM: RETENTION VALUE. HIGH SKILL / LOW COST.
  — ROUGHNECK RYE: EVALUATE FOR TRANSFER OR TERMINATION.

IF AN OPPORTUNITY ARISES TO REROUTE THE MONTERO FOR COMPANY
PURPOSES, YOU ARE AUTHORIZED TO EXERCISE ICC CLAUSE 4720
(SIGNAL INVESTIGATION) OR EQUIVALENT PRETEXT.

CREW MUST NOT BECOME AWARE OF THIS DIRECTIVE.
ALL FINDINGS TO BE TRANSMITTED VIA ENCRYPTED BURST
TO WY-OPS RELAY STATION GAMMA-7.

AUTHORIZATION: DIRECTOR HOLT — FRONTIER OPS
CLASSIFICATION: WY-CORPORATE — EYES ONLY

logs.subject: PERSONAL — CREW DINNER
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — LYRON CHAM
DATE: MARCH 31, 2183

HAD DINNER WITH THE WHOLE CREW TONIGHT. MILLER COOKED. IT WAS TERRIBLE BUT NOBODY COMPLAINED. EVEN RYE WAS SMILING FOR ONCE AND DAVIS TOLD THAT STORY ABOUT THE CARGO LOADER ON THEDUS AGAIN.

GREW UP HOPPING FROM COLONY TO COLONY WITH MY PARENTS. NEVER STAYED ANYWHERE LONG ENOUGH TO CALL IT HOME. NEVER HAD REAL FRIENDS.

THIS CREW IS DIFFERENT. THEY ARE LOUD AND DIFFICULT AND SOMETIMES THEY FIGHT OVER NOTHING. BUT THEY ARE THE CLOSEST THING TO A FAMILY I HAVE EVER HAD. DYSFUNCTION AND ALL.

I WOULD DO ANYTHING TO KEEP THEM SAFE. I DO NOT SAY THAT OUT LOUD BECAUSE IT WOULD SOUND STRANGE. BUT I MEAN IT.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — FAMILY MATTERS
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — KAYLA RYE
DATE: APRIL 1, 2183

GOT ANOTHER MESSAGE FROM MOM BEFORE WE WENT OUT OF COMMS RANGE. SAME AS ALWAYS. TYLERS MEDICATION COSTS WENT UP AGAIN. THIRD TIME THIS YEAR. SHE DID NOT ASK FOR MORE MONEY BUT I COULD HEAR IT IN HER VOICE.

SENT HER EVERYTHING I HAD LEFT FROM LAST MONTHS PAY. KEPT FORTY DOLLARS FOR MYSELF. FORTY DOLLARS FOR A MONTH.

MEANWHILE WILSON SITS IN THE LOUNGE DRINKING REAL COFFEE LIKE HE IS ON VACATION. COMPANY LIAISON. WHAT A JOKE. HE GETS PAID MORE THAN I DO TO WRITE REPORTS NOBODY READS.

I NEED TO FIND AN ANGLE ON THIS RUN. SOMETHING EXTRA. LOYALTY DOES NOT PAY THE BILLS AND I AM TIRED OF PRETENDING IT DOES.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — PRE-CRYOSLEEP FINAL LOG
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — CAPTAIN VANESSA MILLER
DATE: APRIL 1, 2183

LAST ENTRY BEFORE CRYO. 72 TRITIUM TANKS SECURED IN THE HOLD. DAVIS RAN FINAL CHECKS ON THE FEL DRIVE. CHAM DOUBLE CHECKED THE CARGO LOCKS LIKE HE ALWAYS DOES. GOOD MAN.

CRYOSLEEP REVIVAL SET FOR APPROACH TO SUTTERS WORLD. STANDARD RUN. NOTHING FANCY.

TOLD THE CREW TO GET SOME REST BEFORE WE GO UNDER. NOBODY LIKES CRYO BUT IT BEATS SITTING IN A TIN CAN FOR WEEKS WITH NOTHING TO DO.

I KEEP THINKING ABOUT THAT LEASE OPTION. MAYBE AFTER THIS RUN I WILL FINALLY HAVE ENOUGH TO START THE CONVERSATION WITH WY FINANCE.

OR MAYBE I WILL JUST KEEP TELLING MYSELF THAT.

SEE YOU ON THE OTHER SIDE.

logs.subject: PERSONAL — BEFORE CRYO
logs.detail:
PERSONAL LOG — LYRON CHAM
DATE: APRIL 2, 2183

RECORDING THIS IN THE CARGO BAY BEFORE MY CRYO SHIFT. QUIET DOWN HERE. JUST THE HUM OF THE TRITIUM TANKS AND THE AIR CYCLERS.

FOUND MY ROSARY IN MY JACKET POCKET. HAVE NOT PRAYED IN A LONG TIME BUT I HELD IT FOR A WHILE TONIGHT. MY PARENTS WERE NOT RELIGIOUS BUT SOMEONE ON ACHERON GAVE IT TO ME WHEN I WAS A KID. TOLD ME IT WOULD KEEP ME SAFE.

I DO NOT KNOW IF I BELIEVE THAT. BUT I KEEP IT ANYWAY.

EVERYONE IS ACCOUNTED FOR. MILLER IS ON THE BRIDGE DOING FINAL CHECKS. RYE IS ALREADY IN HER POD BECAUSE SHE SAID SHE WANTED TO GET IT OVER WITH. DAVIS IS PROBABLY FLYING SIMS SOMEWHERE.

SEE YOU ALL ON THE OTHER SIDE.

logs.subject: PRIORITY — DISTRESS SIGNAL / RESCUE AND RECOVERY DIRECTIVE
logs.detail:
PRIORITY TRANSMISSION — WEYLAND-YUTANI CORPORATE RELAY
WY DEEP SPACE RELAY NODE GAMMA-7
FREQUENCY: 8713.41 — WY CORPORATE RELAY BAND
ENCRYPTION: STANDARD COMMERCIAL (AES-2048)

TO: CAPTAIN MILLER, V. — COMMANDING OFFICER (USCSS MONTERO)
FROM: WEYLAND-YUTANI FRONTIER OPERATIONS — DEEP SPACE COORDINATION

RE: DISTRESS SIGNAL INTERCEPT — MANDATORY RESCUE AND RECOVERY

CAPTAIN MILLER,

ON 2183-05-19 AT 07:22 UST, WY DEEP SPACE RELAY NODE
GAMMA-7 INTERCEPTED A REPEATING DISTRESS SIGNAL ORIGINATING
FROM COORDINATES (24.3, 39.2), DEEP SPACE BETWEEN ALPHA
AURIGAE AND LAMBDA AURIGAE. TRAJECTORY ANALYSIS INDICATES
THE MONTERO'S CURRENT FTL CORRIDOR PASSES WITHIN VIABLE
INTERCEPT RANGE.

PER INTERSTELLAR COMMERCE COMMISSION REGULATION ICC/WY-4720
AND WEYLAND-YUTANI CORPORATE POLICY ON SEARCH AND RESCUE
OPERATIONS (CLAUSE 8827.5, SUBSECTION B), ALL COMMERCIAL
VESSELS WITHIN RANGE ARE REQUIRED TO INVESTIGATE SIGNALS OF
POSSIBLE DISTRESS ORIGIN. THIS IS A MANDATORY OBLIGATION
UNDER BOTH ICC LAW AND YOUR WEYLAND-YUTANI OPERATING
CONTRACT.

--- SALVAGE RIGHTS ---

PER ICC SALVAGE CODE ARTICLE 7, SECTION 12:
ANY VESSEL OR CARGO RECOVERED DURING AUTHORIZED SEARCH AND
RESCUE OPERATIONS ENTITLES THE RECOVERING CREW TO STANDARD
SALVAGE SHARES UNDER THE FOLLOWING TERMS:
  — CLASS A SALVAGE (INTACT VESSEL): 15% OF ASSESSED VALUE
  — CLASS B SALVAGE (PARTIAL RECOVERY): 10% OF ASSESSED VALUE
  — CLASS C SALVAGE (DATA/MATERIALS ONLY): 5% OF ASSESSED VALUE
SALVAGE SHARES ARE DISTRIBUTED PER CREW RANK AND CONTRACT
TIER.

--- COMPENSATION FOR DELAYS ---

WEYLAND-YUTANI ACKNOWLEDGES THAT COMPLIANCE WITH THIS
DIRECTIVE WILL RESULT IN DEVIATION FROM YOUR SCHEDULED
ROUTE AND DELIVERY TIMELINE. THE COMPANY GUARANTEES THE
FOLLOWING:
  — FULL COMPENSATION AT STANDARD RATE FOR ALL TRANSIT DELAYS
  — FUEL COSTS INCURRED DURING THE DIVERSION WILL BE
    REIMBURSED IN FULL UPON RETURN TO PORT
  — NO PENALTY WILL BE ASSESSED FOR LATE DELIVERY OF YOUR
    CURRENT TRITIUM CARGO TO SUTTER'S WORLD
  — ADDITIONAL HAZARD PAY IF CONDITIONS WARRANT EVA OR
    BOARDING OPERATIONS

PLEASE MAINTAIN DETAILED RECORDS OF ALL FUEL EXPENDITURES,
TRANSIT TIME, AND OPERATIONAL EXPENSES RELATED TO THIS
DIVERSION. ALL DOCUMENTED COSTS WILL BE SUBMITTED FOR
REIMBURSEMENT THROUGH WY FRONTIER OPERATIONS ACCOUNTING
UPON RETURN TO PORT.

--- INSTRUCTIONS ---

MU/TH/UR HAS BEEN UPDATED WITH THE SIGNAL COORDINATES AND
WILL ADJUST YOUR FTL EXIT POINT AND APPROACH VECTOR
ACCORDINGLY. UPON ARRIVAL AT THE SIGNAL SOURCE, ASSESS THE
SITUATION AND PROCEED WITH STANDARD RESCUE AND RECOVERY
PROTOCOLS.

REPORT ALL FINDINGS VIA ENCRYPTED BURST TO WY RELAY
NODE GAMMA-7.

BUILDING BETTER WORLDS.

AUTHORIZATION: FRONTIER OPERATIONS COORDINATOR
CLASSIFICATION: RESTRICTED — CAPTAIN CLEARANCE

logs.subject: SIGNAL INTERCEPT — USCSS CRONUS / SPECIAL ORDER 966
logs.detail:
CONFIDENTIAL — WEYLAND-YUTANI CORPORATE TRANSMISSION
REF: WY-SPD/SIGNAL-INTERCEPT-8713
ENCRYPTION: AES-4096 / BURST PROTOCOL SEVEN

TO: WILSON, J. — COMPANY LIAISON (USCSS MONTERO)
FROM: SPECIAL PROJECTS DIVISION — DEEP SPACE ASSET RECOVERY

RE: SIGNAL INTERCEPT — USCSS CRONUS (REG. 142601)

MR. WILSON,

ON 2183-05-19 AT 07:22 UST, WY DEEP SPACE RELAY NETWORK NODE
GAMMA-7 INTERCEPTED A REPEATING DISTRESS SIGNAL ON FREQUENCY
8713.41 ORIGINATING FROM DEEP SPACE BETWEEN ALPHA AURIGAE
AND LAMBDA AURIGAE AT COORDINATES (24.3, 39.2). SIGNAL
ANALYSIS CONFIRMS TRANSMISSION SOURCE AS USCSS CRONUS, A
WEYLAND SEV M3 HELIADES-CLASS SCIENCE EXPLORATION VESSEL
(REG. 142601) LAUNCHED 2110. VESSEL WAS CLASSIFIED LOST
IN 2112.

TRAJECTORY ANALYSIS INDICATES THE CRONUS IS ADRIFT AT
SUBLIGHT VELOCITY BETWEEN ALPHA AURIGAE AND LAMBDA AURIGAE.
THE MONTERO'S CURRENT TRANSIT CORRIDOR TO SUTTER'S WORLD
PASSES WITHIN VIABLE INTERCEPT RANGE.

THIS RECOVERY OPPORTUNITY IS CONSIDERED PRIORITY ALPHA.

--- SPECIAL ORDER 966 (REACTIVATED) ---

YOU ARE HEREBY INFORMED THAT THE ORIGINAL CRONUS MISSION
OPERATED UNDER SPECIAL ORDER 966, NOEROMO PROTOCOL.
MISSION OBJECTIVE: RECOVERY AND ANALYSIS OF CHEMICAL AGENT
A0-3959X.91-15, A BIOLOGICAL COMPOUND OF EXTRAORDINARY
VALUE DISCOVERED ON PLANETOID LV-1113 IN THE 26 DRACONIS
SYSTEM.

THE CRONUS CREW CONFIRMED RECOVERY OF SPECIMENS PRIOR TO
LOSS OF CONTACT IN 2110. THERE IS A HIGH PROBABILITY THAT
BIOLOGICAL SAMPLES REMAIN ABOARD THE VESSEL.

--- YOUR DIRECTIVES ---

1. THE MONTERO WILL BE AUTOMATICALLY REROUTED TO THE CRONUS
   SIGNAL SOURCE VIA MU/TH/UR NAVIGATION OVERRIDE WHEN THE
   VESSEL ENTERS INTERCEPT RANGE. CREW REVIVAL FROM CRYO
   WILL BE TRIGGERED AT THAT TIME. THIS DIVERSION WILL BE
   PRESENTED TO CAPTAIN MILLER UNDER SEARCH AND RESCUE
   CLAUSE 8827.5, SUBSECTION B. DO NOT DISCLOSE THE TRUE
   NATURE OF THE INTERCEPT.

2. UPON BOARDING THE CRONUS, YOUR PRIMARY OBJECTIVE IS TO
   LOCATE AND SECURE ANY SURVIVING BIOLOGICAL SPECIMENS
   FROM THE ORIGINAL LV-1113 EXPEDITION. ALL BIOLOGICAL
   MATERIAL IS WEYLAND-YUTANI PROPERTY UNDER PROTOCOL
   WY-7741. SPECIMEN CONTAINMENT TAKES ABSOLUTE PRIORITY.

3. SECONDARY OBJECTIVE: RECOVER ALL MISSION DATA, RESEARCH
   LOGS, AND SCIENTIFIC RECORDS. NOTE THAT COMPANY LIAISON
   LORI CLAYTON (CRONUS CREW) TRANSFERRED ORIGINAL RESEARCH
   DATA TO A PORTABLE MEDIA CARTRIDGE (MCD) PRIOR TO LOSS
   OF CONTACT. IF CLAYTON OR THE MCD ARE RECOVERABLE, THEY
   ARE HIGH-VALUE ASSETS.

4. THE CRONUS MAY CONTAIN SURVIVING CREW IN CRYOGENIC
   STASIS. ANY SURVIVORS ARE TO BE REVIVED AND ASSESSED.
   CREW WHO WERE EXPOSED TO CHEMICAL AGENT A0-3959X.91-15
   ARE THEMSELVES CONSIDERED BIOLOGICAL ASSETS OF RESEARCH
   VALUE. THE SHIP MEDIC — FLYNN, L. — IS FLAGGED AS A
   PERSON OF INTEREST IN THIS REGARD.

5. IF CIRCUMSTANCES REQUIRE, YOU ARE AUTHORIZED TO USE
   YOUR CORPORATE COMMAND CODE (12726539) TO OVERRIDE
   MONTERO SYSTEMS AND ENSURE COMPLIANCE WITH THESE
   DIRECTIVES.

--- WARNINGS ---

THE CRONUS WAS LOST UNDER HOSTILE CONDITIONS. FINAL
TRANSMISSIONS INDICATED UNIDENTIFIED BIOLOGICAL CONTACTS
ABOARD THE VESSEL AND SIGNIFICANT STRUCTURAL DAMAGE.
EXERCISE APPROPRIATE CAUTION DURING BOARDING OPERATIONS.

DO NOT ALLOW THE MONTERO CREW TO DESTROY, JETTISON, OR
OTHERWISE COMPROMISE ANY BIOLOGICAL MATERIAL FOUND ABOARD
THE CRONUS. SPECIMENS ARE TO BE PRESERVED AT ALL COSTS.

ALL OTHER CONSIDERATIONS ARE SECONDARY.

THIS TRANSMISSION WILL AUTO-PURGE FROM THE MONTERO COMMS
BUFFER 72 HOURS AFTER FIRST ACCESS. SAVE LOCALLY IF
REQUIRED.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WILL RESULT IN FORFEITURE OF ALL
COMPENSATION, TERMINATION OF EMPLOYMENT, AND CRIMINAL
PROSECUTION UNDER ICC CHARTER SECTION 7.

BUILDING BETTER WORLDS.

AUTHORIZATION: DIRECTOR HOLT — SPECIAL PROJECTS DIVISION
SECONDARY: SPD-DIRECTOR MERIDIAN (ORIGINAL SO-966 AUTHORITY)
CLASSIFICATION: WY-CORPORATE — EYES ONLY
